name: Blue Attack!
description:
Attack the Red planet!

Blue Attack places you on the front lines of the intergalactic war between the Red and Blue forces. Use the scraps picked up from your enemies' wrecked hulls to turn your squadron into an unstoppable army!

Protect your carrier, upgrade your wingmen, and cut a path clean through to your target: the Red home planet!

Features:
- Fully customizable ships, from speed to weapon capabilities
- Clean, oldschool graphical style
- Global high scores
- Music and sound effects
- Save state ensures that you can quit and come back to your game at any time

Controls:
- Both touch and tilt controls are available for ship movement and aiming
- Touch the "action icons" at the side of the screen to launch/dock wingmen, change your squad formation, set off bombs, and much more
- Touch the "gears" icon in the bottom right to pause the game and access the options menu

Tilt Controls (default):
- Hold the device flat to the ground
- Tilt forwards, backwards, left and right to fly around freely
- Tilt less to go slowly

Touch Controls (available through the options menu):
- Touch the screen in the direction you want to go
- Touch near the centre of the screen to go slowly
